pageTitle: EU Flood Monitoring System - Real Data Search
headerSubtitle: Real-time search for real flood data - from official weather APIs and social media
confirmDate: Confirm Date (can be manually modified, used for generating event ID)
dateHint: Default parsed from filename (e.g., 20251106), can be changed
thresholdSetting: Threshold Setting (default 50.0, can be modified; shows points with values greater than this threshold)
thresholdHint: Defaults to 50.0 if empty or invalid

useSearchForm: Use the search form above to find real flood data
